body: This +2 improved shadow leather armor is attractive, yet eerie. It grants its wearer the ability to use vanish as a quickened spell-like ability five times per day. If a mythic wearer uses the vanish ability, he can expend one use of mythic power to also make himself incorporeal for 1 round.
name: Spiritwalk Armor
url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Items/Magic Items/Specific Armors and Shields/Spiritwalk Armor
